product_name: Coleman Tent Fan with LED Light - CPX Compatible
long_description: The Coleman tent fan with LED light brings a breeze to a hot summer night. Add the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 battery pack (sold separately) for convenient rechargeable power. Multiple power options let you set the amount of airflow to your liking; 4 fan blades move lots of air. Fan can be used overhead in a tent, on the ground or on a table. 4 white LEDs fend off darkness while you are tent-bound; night-light mode emits soft, pleasing light. Operates on 4 D batteries (sold separately); can also operate on the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 rechargeable battery pack (sold separately) and the CPX AC adapter (not included). Coleman tent fan with LED light features independent controls for the fan and light.
short_description: The Coleman tent fan with LED light brings a breeze to a hot summer night. Add the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 battery pack (sold separately) for convenient rechargeable power.
